name: Block Tag
description:
The goal of the game is for the Chaser[red square] to catch the Runner[white square] 3-5 times before the time runs out. Both players can use various power ups that spawn throughout the game.

This is my first game and I made it using the Godot game engine. The game might be a bit buggy but I want to move on to other projects so i'm releasing it anyway.

All art, music and sfx made by me.

Feedback is appreciated.
